reviewText: Although cluttered with more dubious Chinese philosophy than most Americans want or need, this DVD is clear and easy to follow.  I was taught some Wu-style tai chi long ago and wanted to try to pick it up again.  Of the several books and two videos I have bought, this is the most practical and useful by far.  The front and back views are a benefit.  While it is impossible to learn any martial art from a book or video, I am able to use this one to revive a somewhat forgotten knowledge.
This was beyond my expectations as a video depiction of the Wu style which doesn't seem nearly as popular as Yang derivations in my neighborhood -- Thanks;)
